entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 85 %

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
